name: mweinberg
cooked:
Hi bemnet. Generally speaking we recommend waiting until you have a stable release of the hardware before certifying. Among other things, that makes it much more likely that a user of your hardware will be able to find documentation that corresponds to the hardware that they actually possess.

-michael
raw:
Hi bemnet.  Generally speaking we recommend waiting until you have a stable release of the hardware before certifying.  Among other things, that makes it much more likely that a user of your hardware will be able to find documentation that corresponds to the hardware that they actually possess. 

-michael
